definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個宣告火辣的夏天已經來臨的儀式。

sentences.english: This announcement will arouse a feeling of anger among freedom-loving people.
sentences.chinese: 這一宣告將會激起愛好自由人們的憤怒。

sentences.english: Thou annointest my day with pep; my mug runneth over.
sentences.chinese: 你宣告了我充沛的一天，一切的疲憊必然消失不見。

sentences.english: The contract was declared null and void.
They depend on glacial melt for irrigation, but the glaciers are doomed.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠着冰川融水灌溉，但冰川本身被宣告了死刑。

sentences.english: We declare him anathematized and excommunicated and we judge him condemned to eternal fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們宣告他被詛咒及驅逐出教，並斷定他不得永生。

sentences.english: The fifth part introduced the announcement system construction of objective incapability of procedure of execution.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分介紹了客觀執行不能宣告制度的構建。

sentences.english: The global server of the best results will allow you to show your results to whole world!
sentences.chinese: 如果你玩出好成績，就會向全世界宣告的。

sentences.english: The jury brought in an acquittal .
Here are instructions on how to announce an elopement.
sentences.chinese: 下面我會就怎樣去宣告私奔列出一些建議。

sentences.english: They proclaimed a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people.
sentences.chinese: 宣告禁食，叫拿伯坐在民間的高位上。

sentences.english: But the plaintiffs in the various suits want the new patent invalidated .
sentences.chinese: 幾件訴訟的原告則是希望這項新專利能宣告無效。

sentences.english: He and Premier Wen Jiabao regularly proclaim an aspiration to hexie shehui, or a harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 他和總理溫家寶經常宣告和諧社會的願望。

sentences.english: The announcement was greeted with a muted sigh of disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 這個宣告卻迎來人們充滿失望的暗自嘆息。

sentences.english: I announce adhesiveness, I say it shall be limitless, unloosen'd.
sentences.chinese: 我宣告人的粘着性，我說它將是無限的，永不鬆釦。

sentences.english: And there was even speculation that the oil giant would go bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 坊間甚至一度猜測，這家石油巨頭可能將宣告破產。

definition: end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
to be shattered/to be annihilated (of hope, illusions etc)
